requirement.statement: When producing content, content creators MUST produce content that is schema valid.

derived-requirement.statement: All content instances MUST pass a validating parse with no errors prior to performing any other processing.

requirement.summary: The default XML language is specified.
requirement.statement: The root element MUST specify an @xml:lang attribute with a non-blank value to indicate the default human language used for expressing all language-dependent attribute values.

derived-requirement.statement: The root element MUST specify an @xml:lang attribute with a non-blank value.
derived-requirement.message: The root element does not specify an @xml:lang attribute.

derived-requirement.statement: The root element MUST specify a non-blank @xml:lang attribute value.
derived-requirement.message: The root element does not specify a non-blank @xml:lang attribute value.

requirement.summary: The default language of the target platform is specified
requirement.statement: When specifying a value for the root @xml:lang attribute, content creators SHOULD use the language tag corresponding to the default language of the device where the content resides.
